attributes.action:
BAN PUBLIC SALE OF FIREWORKS

Save our Animals
attributes.additional_details:
Also you get idiots throwing them at people houses cars animals the damage they cause that other folk need to pay to repair or replace or even if they get hurt nothing gets done about this.  

Petitions get made every year and yet nothing happens so we need to continue to make them continue to share and get as many as possible!!

NO PUBLIC SALE FIREWORKS = NO DESTRUCTION AND ANIMALS CAN LIVE IN PEACE PLEASE LIKE SHARE SIGN WHATEVER YOU CAN DO PLEASE DO IT.. THIS NEEDS TO STOP
attributes.background:
I strongly believe the public sale of fireworks should be banned.
 
poor animals live in fear for weeks not just a day they go on for weeks and it surely should be considered a ban for their rights!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
